#define how big I want the picture to be
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))

#define how to rotate the map
m = Basemap(projection='lcc', resolution=None, width=8E6, height =8E6, lat_0=45, lon_0 =-100,)

#define the scale of the map
m.etopo(scale=1, alpha = 1)  

#Plot the coordinates of New York City
x, y = m(-74, 40.7128)
plt.plot(x, y, 'ok', markersize=5)
plt.text(x, y, 'New York City', fontsize=12);
